name: Quaking Ground
description: The ground is shaking so hard, and rocks are flung upwards. It's hard to reliably stay mid-air. Ground types can use this quaking to bolster themselfes.
effect:
- Ground type moves can hit levitating pokemon and flying types.
- Removes active terrain effects and terrain can't be set for the duration.
- Attacks against ground types need an additional 6 to crit.
